config.desc: 合买代购（后台引擎SQL配置）
config.sql: select cpassword pwd from tblusers where cuserid = ?
update tblusers set cpassword = ? where cuserid = ? and cpassword = ?
select t.cname, t1.* from tb_game t, tb_game_config t1 where t.cgameid = t1.cgameid order by t.cgameid
select * from tb_vote order by cvoteid
select t1.cgameid, t1.cname from tb_vote_game t, tb_game t1 where t.cvoteid = ? and t.cgameid = t1.cgameid
select * from tb_machine where 1=1
select t1.cgameid, t1.cname from tb_machine_game t, tb_game t1 where t.cmachineid = ? and t.cgameid = t1.cgameid
select cgameid gid,cperiodid pid,cbegintime stime, cendtime etime, cawardtime atime, istate state from tb_period where cgameid = ? and istate <= 1
update tb_period set istate = decode(istate,0,1,0) where cgameid = ? and cperiodid = ? and istate = decode(istate,1,1,0,0,-1)
select count(*) num from tb_period where cgameid = ? and istate <= 1

select citemid tid,cname tname,imatchid mid,cmname mname, csname sname, cmscore ms, csscore ss, chmscore hms, chsscore hss, close lose, cendtime etime, istate state, cmatchtime mtime, iaudit, decode(iaudit,1,'已审核','未审核') aname, decode(icancel,1,'已取消','未取消') cancel, decode(isale,0,'暂停销售','正在销售') sale from tb_match_jczq where 1=1
select count(*) num from tb_match_jczq where 1=1
update tb_match_jczq set iaudit = 1, cauditdate = sysdate, cauditor = ? where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set icancel = 1 where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set isale = decode(isale,1,0,1) where citemid = ?

select citemid tid,cname tname,imatchid mid,cmname mname, csname sname, cmscore ms, csscore ss, zclose zlose, close lose, cendtime etime, istate state, cmatchtime mtime, iaudit, decode(iaudit,1,'已审核','未审核') aname, decode(icancel,1,'已取消','未取消') cancel, decode(isale,0,'正在销售','暂停销售') sale from tb_match_jclq where 1=1
select count(*) num from tb_match_jclq where 1=1
update tb_match_jclq set iaudit = 1, cauditdate = sysdate, cauditor = ? where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jclq set icancel = 1 where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jclq set isale = decode(isale,1,0,1) where citemid = ?
select imatchid tid,cmname mname, csname sname, cmscore ms, csscore ss, cendtime etime, cbegintime mtime, cresult result, ccolor, istate state from tb_match_zc where cgameid = ? and cperiodid = ?

select imatchid mid,cmname mname, csname sname, cmscore ms, csscore ss, chmscore hms, chsscore hss, close lose, cendtime etime, cresult,ccolor,istate state, cbegintime mtime, iaudit, decode(iaudit,1,'已审核','未审核') aname, decode(icancel,1,'已取消','未取消') cancel, decode(isale,0,'正在销售','暂停销售') sale from tb_match_bd where cperiodid = ?
update tb_match_bd set iaudit = 1, cauditdate = sysdate, cauditor = ? where cperiodid = ? and imatchid = ?
update tb_match_bd set icancel = 1 where cperiodid = ? and imatchid = ?
update tb_match_bd set isale = decode(isale,1,0,1) where cperiodid = ? and imatchid = ?
select * from tb_agent order by cagentid
select * from tb_sbalance order by cstatday desc
select * from tb_agent_stat t where 1 = 1
select * from tb_agent_charge t where cagentid = ?
select count(*) num from tb_agent_charge where cagentid = ?
select cgameid gid,cperiodid pid,cbegintime stime, cendtime etime, cawardtime atime, istate state, cawardcode awardcode from tb_period where icodeaudit = 0 and cawardtime < sysdate and istate < 99
update tb_period set cawardcode = ? where cgameid = ? and cperiodid = ?

select cgameid gid,cperiodid pid,cbegintime stime, cendtime etime, cawardtime atime, istate state, cawardcode awardcode from tb_period where icodeaudit = 0 and cawardtime < sysdate and cawardcode is not null
update tb_period set icodeaudit = 1, cawardor = ?, ccodeauditdate = sysdate where cgameid = ? and cperiodid = ?

select cgameid gid,cperiodid pid, cawardtime atime, istate state, cawardcode awardcode, cgradeinfo ginfo, cgnuminfo gnums, crealsale gsale, crealpool gpool from tb_period where icodeaudit = 1 and imoneyaudit = 0

select cgameid gid,cperiodid pid, cawardtime atime, istate state, cawardcode awardcode, cgradeinfo ginfo, cgnuminfo gnums, crealsale gsale, crealpool gpool from tb_period where icodeaudit = 1 and imoneyaudit = 0 and cgradeinfo is not null
update tb_period set cgradeinfo = ?, cgnuminfo = ?, crealsale = ?, crealpool = ? where cgameid = ? and cperiodid = ?

select igrade grade, cname name, imoney money, t1.crealsale gsale, t1.crealpool gpool from tb_grade_def t, tb_period t1 where t.cgameid = ? and t1.cperiodid = ? and t1.cgameid (+)= t.cgameid order by t.igrade
update tb_period set imoneyaudit = 1, cmoneyor = ?, cmoneyauditdate = sysdate where cgameid = ? and cperiodid = ?

select icastid cid, cbatchid bid, capplyid did, cagentid aid, cperiodid pid, ccodes codes,imulity mul, imoney money, cvoteid vid, cendtime etime, decode(ifileflag,0,'未出',1,'正在出',20,'超时','已出票') flag, cadddate adate from tb_cast_list_#gid# where (ifileflag <= 1 or ifileflag = 20) and icancel = 0 order by cendtime,imoney desc,icastid
select count(*) num from tb_cast_list_#gid# where (ifileflag <= 1 or ifileflag = 20) and icancel = 0

sql.order: order by cstatday desc, cmachineid, cgameid

config.sql: select * from tb_machine_rept where cstatday >= ? and cstatday <= ?
select count(*) num from tb_machine_rept where cstatday >= ? and cstatday <= ?
select * from tb_machine_trept where cstatday >= ? and cstatday <= ?
select count(*) num from tb_machine_trept where cstatday >= ? and cstatday <= ?
select cmachineid mid,imoney jkmoney,cjkdate jkdate from tb_machine_jk where cjkdate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cjkdate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
select count(*) num from tb_machine_jk where cjkdate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and cjkdate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1

select ijobid jid,cmachineid mid,itmoney money, inums nums, ccreatedate cdate, cfinishdate fdate, iflag flag, cerrcode ecode, cerrdesc edesc, cvoteid vid, cgameid gid from tb_cash_job where ccreatedate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and ccreatedate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
select count(*) num from tb_cash_job where ccreatedate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') and ccreatedate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
select * from tb_cash_detail where ijobid = ?
update tb_cash_job set iflag = 0 where ijobid = ?
update tb_cast_list_#gid# set ifileflag = 0 where icastid = ? and ifileflag = 20
sp_create_cashjob

select icastid cid, cbatchid bid, capplyid did, cagentid aid, cperiodid pid, ccodes codes,imulity mul, imoney money, cvoteid vid, cendtime etime, decode(ifileflag,0,'未出',1,'正在出',20,'超时','已出票') flag, cadddate adate from tb_cast_list_#gid# where cbatchid = ? order by icastid
select count(*) num from tb_cast_list_#gid# where cbatchid = ?
update tb_cast_list_#gid# set cendtime = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') where cbatchid = ?
select cmachineid m, cstatday d, isales s, ifills f, icashs c, iobalance o, inbalance n from tb_mday_stat where cstatday >= ? and cstatday <= ?
select cstatday d, sum(isales) s, sum(ifills) f, sum(icashs) c, sum(iobalance) o , sum(inbalance) n from tb_mday_stat where cstatday >= ? and cstatday <= ? group by cstatday order by cstatday
sp_cancel_batch
